”Alexa, turn on foot”

skdetail:
Smart Home Skill. This skill may share device information with Amazon. Learn more.
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des:
This skill requires special hardware only available from Limited Mobility Solutions and a client account with Limited Mobility Solutions. You will enable the skill using your Amazon account and password. Each solution is unique. The most common example is a custom solution for using Alexa voice command to operate a bed.

This updated solutions allows multiple device controllers for whole-house solutions for beds, door locks and similar devices that do not have a native voice activated solution.

These solutions are normally provided at no cost.

If you have a requirement for a voice activated solution to your mobility limitations, contact us at info@limitedmobility.solutions
